1: רְדִ֣י ׀ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>Come down</n> וּשְׁבִ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and sit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>in</n> עָפָ֗ר <sup>6083 </sup> <n>in the dust</n> בְּתוּלַת֙ <sup>1330 </sup> <n>O virgin</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>daughter</n> בָּבֶ֔ל <sup>894 </sup> <n>of Babylon</n> שְׁבִי־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>sit</n> לָאָ֥רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>on the ground</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>without</n> כִּסֵּ֖א <sup>3678 </sup> <n>[there is] no throne</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>of the Chaldeans</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall no</n> תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>for thou shalt no more</n> יִקְרְאוּ־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>be called</n> לָ֔ךְ רַכָּ֖ה <sup>7390 </sup> <n>tender</n> וַעֲנֻגָּֽה׃ <sup>6028 </sup> <n>and delicate</n>
2: קְחִ֥י <sup>3947 </sup> <n>Take</n> רֵחַ֖יִם <sup>7347 </sup> <n>the millstones</n> וְטַ֣חֲנִי <sup>2912 </sup> <n>and grind</n> קָ֑מַח <sup>7058 </sup> <n>meal</n> גַּלִּ֨י <sup>1540 </sup> <n>uncover</n> צַמָּתֵ֧ךְ <sup>6777 </sup> <n>thy locks</n> חֶשְׂפִּי־ <sup>2834 </sup> <n>make bare</n> שֹׁ֛בֶל <sup>7640 </sup> <n>the leg</n> גַּלִּי־ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>uncover</n> שׁ֖וֹק <sup>7785 </sup> <n>the thigh</n> עִבְרִ֥י <sup>5674 </sup> <n>pass over</n> נְהָרֽוֹת׃ <sup>5104 </sup> <n>the rivers</n>
3: תִּגָּל֙ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>shall be uncovered</n> עֶרְוָתֵ֔ךְ <sup>6172 </sup> <n>Thy nakedness</n> גַּ֥ם <sup>1571 </sup> <n>also</n> תֵּרָאֶ֖ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall be seen</n> חֶרְפָּתֵ֑ךְ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>yea thy shame</n> נָקָ֣ם <sup>5359 </sup> <n>vengeance</n> אֶקָּ֔ח <sup>3947 </sup> <n>I will take</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and will not</n> אֶפְגַּ֖ע <sup>6293 </sup> <n>and I will not meet</n> אָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>[thee as] a man</n> ס
4: גֹּאֲלֵ֕נוּ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[As for] our redeemer</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> צְבָא֖וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> שְׁמ֑וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n> קְד֖וֹשׁ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
5: שְׁבִ֥י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>Sit</n> דוּמָ֛ם <sup>1748 </sup> <n>thou silent</n> וּבֹ֥אִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>and get</n> בַחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>thee into darkness</n> בַּת־ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>O daughter</n> כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <sup>3778 </sup> <n>of the Chaldeans</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will no</n> תוֹסִ֙יפִי֙ <sup>3254 </sup> <n>for thou shalt no more</n> יִקְרְאוּ־ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>be called</n> לָ֔ךְ גְּבֶ֖רֶת <sup>1404 </sup> <n>The lady</n> מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <sup>4467 </sup> <n>of kingdoms</n>
6: קָצַ֣פְתִּי <sup>7107 </sup> <n>I was wroth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> עַמִּ֗י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with my people</n> חִלַּ֙לְתִּי֙ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>I have polluted</n> נַחֲלָתִ֔י <sup>5159 </sup> <n>mine inheritance</n> וָאֶתְּנֵ֖ם <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and given</n> בְּיָדֵ֑ךְ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>them into thine hand</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> שַׂ֤מְתְּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>thou didst shew</n> לָהֶם֙ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> רַחֲמִ֔ים <sup>7356 </sup> <n>them no mercy</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> זָקֵ֕ן <sup>2205 </sup> <n>upon the ancient</n> הִכְבַּ֥דְתְּ <sup>3513 </sup> <n>heavily</n> עֻלֵּ֖ךְ <sup>5923 </sup> <n>laid thy yoke</n> מְאֹֽד׃ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>hast thou very</n>

8: וְעַתָּ֞ה <sup>6258 </sup> <n>Now</n> שִׁמְעִי־ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>Therefore hear</n> זֹ֤את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>you</n> עֲדִינָה֙ <sup>5719 </sup> <n>now this [thou that art] given to pleasures</n> הַיּוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that dwellest</n> לָבֶ֔טַח <sup>983 </sup> <n>carelessly</n> הָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>that sayest</n> בִּלְבָ֔בָהּ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>in thine heart</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> וְאַפְסִ֣י <sup>657 </sup> <n>I [am] and none else</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>besides</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> אֵשֵׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>beside me I shall not sit</n> אַלְמָנָ֔ה <sup>490 </sup> <n>[as] a widow</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> אֵדַ֖ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>neither shall I know</n> שְׁכֽוֹל׃ <sup>7908 </sup> <n>the loss of children</n>

14: הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> הָי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have become</n> כְקַשׁ֙ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>Behold they shall be as stubble</n> אֵ֣שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>the fire</n> שְׂרָפָ֔תַם <sup>8313 </sup> <n>shall burn</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>cannot</n> יַצִּ֥ילוּ <sup>5337 </sup> <n>them they shall not deliver</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> נַפְשָׁ֖ם <sup>5315 </sup> <n>themselves</n> מִיַּ֣ד <sup>3027 </sup> <n>from the power</n> לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>of the flame</n> אֵין־ <sup>369 </sup> <n>There</n> גַּחֶ֣לֶת <sup>1513 </sup> <n>[there shall] not [be] a coal</n> לַחְמָ֔ם <sup>2552 </sup> <n>to warm</n> א֖וּר <sup>217 </sup> <n>at [nor] fire</n> לָשֶׁ֥בֶת <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to sit</n> נֶגְדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>before</n>
